p: Eight samples of fibre-type female inflorescences were analysed in this study, including Antal, Carma, Carmagnola, China, Codimono, Fibrante, Futura and Santhica. These samples (about 100–500 g of dry material each), belonging to different breeding lines, were cultivated under the same agronomic conditions and they were kindly provided by Dr. Gianpaolo Grassi of the research centre CREA-CIN (Rovigo, Italy). Each sample was certified for a content of Δ 9-THC below 0.2% ( w/w). All the samples considered in this study were approved for commercial use by the European Union [ 31].
